data.title: General Information
data.text:
The District Court hears landlord/tenant cases, replevin actions, traffic violations, criminal cases classified as misdemeanors and certain felonies, and civil cases in the amount of $30,000 or less. The District Court does not conduct jury trials.

General Information: 410-996-2700 | Toll-Free Number (In-state only): 1-800-941-0408

TTY users call Maryland RELAY: 711

The courthouse is located at 170 E. Main Street, Elkton, MD 21921-5943. No food or drink are permitted in this building. For assistance with special needs, contact the court immediately.

General

Take I-95 to Exit 109-A (Elkton). Proceed off exit ramp onto Route 279. At the third traffic light turn left onto Route 213 (Bridge Street). Follow Route 213 to the fourth traffic light (Main Street). Turn left onto Main Street. After the next traffic light the Court will be located on the right.

Bus Information

"THE BUS," Glasgow Connection

https://www.ccgov.org/government/community-services/cecil-transit

Parking on site.

On April 4, 2022, the Maryland Judiciary returned to normal operations exiting the

five-phased COVID-19 resumption of operations plan.
